pageContext.claim: “Small businesses can now deduct 20 percent of their business income and manufacturers can now immediately deduct every penny spent on new equipment.”
pageContext.analysis: This tax break isn't the free for all that Trump makes it sound like. CNBC reports, " to qualify for the full deduction, your taxable income must be below $157,500 if you're single or $315,000 if you're married and file jointly." If income exceeds those thresholds then additional restrictions apply.
